Uses of Package
langModel

  • Classes in langModel used by langModel 
    Class and Description
    LanguageModelInterface
    Interface LanguageModelInterface: interface to describe a language model.
    NaiveLanguageModel
    Class NaiveLanguageModel: class implementing the interface LanguageModelInterface by creating a naive language model, i.e. a n-gram language model with no smoothing.
    NgramCountsInterface
    Interface NgramCountsInterface: interface to build the counts of n-grams from a training corpus (to be used by a language model).
    VocabularyInterface
    Interface VocabularyInterface: interface to represent the vocabulary associated to a language model (it can be made of words or characters).
